Description:
Managing access in modern organizations is complex, particularly with the rise of hybrid work, external partners, and increasing compliance requirements. Microsoft Entra ID’s Access Packages offer a powerful way to automate and govern access to apps, groups, and resources at scale.

In the Demo-packed session, you’ll understand how to leverage Access Packages to reduce risk, improve productivity, and enforce Zero Trust principles in your organization.
Author: Microsoft Developer
Title: Simplifying Access Governance with Microsoft Entra ID Access Packages
